articles.title: Crisis in India-Bangladesh relations spirals amid violent protests - BBC
articles.description: Recent deadly protests in Bangladesh are further straining Delhi's already frayed tied with Dhaka.
articles.content:
Anbarasan EthirajanGlobal affairs correspondent 
Protests erupted in India over the killing of a Hindu garment worker in Bangladesh
The killing of a Hindu man during recent violent protests in Bang… [+7560 chars]
